mapper.select: SELECT * FROM workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no=d.d_no left join event e on w.w_e_name=e.e_name left join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name=p.p_name left join guest g on w_g_no=g.g_no where w.w_no=#{wNo}

SELECT * FROM workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no=d.d_no left join event e on w.w_e_name=e.e_name left join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name=p.p_name left join guest g on w_g_no=g.g_no where w.w_d_no=#{wDNo} and w_reservTime > concat(curdate(), ' 00:00:00') and w_reservTime < concat(curdate(), ' 23:59:59') order by w_reservTime
select w_no, w_workTime, w_reservTime, w_e_name, w_d_no, w_g_no, g.g_name from workdialog w join guest g on w.w_d_no=#{dNo} and w.w_g_no=g.g_no;

select w_no, w_workTime, w_reservTime, w_e_name, w_d_no, w_g_no, c_w_no, c_p_name, g_no, g_l_grade, g_email, g_birth, g_name, g_tel, g_point, g_memo from workdialog w left join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no left join guest g on w.w_g_no=g.g_no

SELECT g_name, w_workTime, p_name, p_price FROM workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no=d.d_no left join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name=p.p_name left join guest g on w_g_no=g.g_no;

select w_no , w_reservTime , d.d_name, d.d_grade, g.g_name, g.g_l_grade, p.p_name, w_e_name, w_priceTotal, w_workTime from workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no = d.d_no left join guest g on w.w_g_no = g.g_no left join choice c on w.w_g_no = c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name = p.p_name left join tax t on p.p_name=t.t_name order by w_reservTime desc
